scripts.ci: yarn link && koinos-sdk-as-cli create mycontract && cd mycontract && yarn install && yarn link @koinos/sdk-as-cli && yarn build:debug && yarn test && cd .. && yarn unlink
scripts.ci:windows: npm link && koinos-sdk-as-cli create mycontract && cd mycontract && npm install && npm link @koinos/sdk-as-cli && koinos-sdk-as-cli build-all debug 0 mycontract.proto && koinos-sdk-as-cli run-tests && cd .. && npm unlink
